meaningMnemonic: <kanji>One</kanji> <kanji>times</kanji> is <vocabulary>one time</vocabulary>. How many times? Just one.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. Take note that 一 is shortened (as it often is) to いっ.
